pageTitle: Grid : Raid Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (6) [API] Status "range" parameter is now treated as a boolean, not a number. [API] Status parameter may be passed as either the traditional argument list, or as a table. Increased the default width of the config frame to prevent random wrapping bugs. Increased the default font size from 11 to 12. Added the Blizzard raid bar texture. Added monks to the By Class layouts. Fixed errors in Spanish clients (ticket #611). Fixed the Resurrection module's handling of res casts on targets who already had a res available. Fixed range checking on dead targets for monks. Fixed the text color when disabling the "Invert text color" option. The "Minimum Value" setting for the Incoming Heals status is now a percentage of the unit's maximum health, rather than a fixed value. Updated for WoW 5.0.4 Version 5.0.4.1517 Fixed a bug in the Ready Check module (ticket #626) Version 5.0.4.1520 Removed the Class Filter and Range Filter options for statuses. This was announced on the download page and in the forum thread months ago, and nobody presented any compelling arguments for keeping these options, but if you missed the announcements, and this change ruins your life, please come to the WowAce forum thread and tell us why they were useful. Added partial Italian localization from
